long_description: Hike, bike, run and more. Whatever your outdoor passion is, the Gregory Miwok 6 Pack is a minimalist gear hauler made for active movement in the outdoors. Main compartment has 2 mesh organizer pockets with a key clip. Interior mesh security pocket. Zig-zag front bungee for overflow storage. Dual quick-access hipbelt pockets. The Gregory Miwok 6 Pack features a sunglasses stash on the shoulder harness.
short_description: Hike, bike, run and more. Whatever your outdoor passion is, the Gregory Miwok 6 Pack is a minimalist gear hauler made for active movement in the outdoors.
